merge.filesNeedAIMergeDueToRenames_other: {{count}} files need AI merge due to {{renameCount}} file renames.

merge.fileRenamesDetected_other: {{count}} file renames detected - AI will handle the merge.
merge.filesRenamedOrMoved: Files may have been renamed or moved - AI will handle the merge.
merge.alreadyMergedDescription: These changes appear to already exist in your current branch. You can safely mark this task as done.
merge.alreadyMergedTooltip: The task's changes are already present in your branch. Marking as done will clean up the worktree without merging.
merge.supersededDescription: Your current branch has a newer version of these changes. Consider discarding this task or viewing the comparison.
merge.supersededCompareTooltip: View a detailed comparison to see how the current branch differs from this task's changes.
merge.supersededDiscardTooltip: Remove this task's worktree since the changes are no longer needed.

status.stageOnly: Stage only (review in IDE before committing)

pr.title: Create Pull Request
pr.description: Push branch and create a pull request for "{{taskTitle}}"

errors.unknown: An unknown error occurred while creating the pull request
errors.invalidBranchName: Branch name contains invalid characters. Use only letters, numbers, hyphens (-), underscores (_), and forward slashes (/).
errors.emptyTitle: Pull request title cannot be empty.

success.alreadyExists: A pull request already exists for this branch

hints.targetBranch: Leave empty to use the default branch
hints.prTitle: Leave empty to use the task title

mergeProgress.completionMessage: All changes have been merged successfully.
mergeProgress.errorMessage: An error occurred during the merge process.
